abstract: Editorial warns that both the domestic and international banking communities are attempting to weaken financial reform proposals that would tighten regulations; urges regulators to resist bankers' pleas; argues that bankers' claims that tighter rules would reduce growth are scare tactics.
snippet: Regulators must resist bankers pleas to loosen financial reform. If anything the rules must be tightened.
lead_paragraph: Regulators must resist bankers pleas to loosen financial reform. If anything the rules must be tightened.
